events.message: We received an application from a highly qualified software engineer interested in our backend developer position.
The application has been categorized under Engineering due to the applicant's strong experience in software development and devops.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to coordinate the next steps with the candidate.
Conducted the initial screening call, and the candidate demonstrated strong technical knowledge and enthusiasm for the software engineer role.
The candidate responded promptly confirming availability for a technical interview next week.
A technical interview has been scheduled with the engineering team for April 10th at 2 PM UTC.
The candidate performed excellently during the technical interview, answering all questions confidently and solving coding challenges.
An HR interview has been scheduled for April 13th to discuss company culture and candidate expectations.
HR interview went smoothly; the candidate showed strong alignment with company values and communicated career goals clearly.
An official job offer was proposed to the candidate including competitive salary and benefits tailored for the software engineering role.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer, expressing enthusiasm about joining the engineering team.
The candidate accepted the offer, confirming their commitment to start with us next month as a software engineer.
Onboarding process commenced; the new software engineer has completed initial setup and orientation activities successfully.
The hiring process is officially closed with the successful onboarding of the engineer into the development team.
